body.raw:
## Overview

Compare the weather of two cities and show time zone differences using OpenWeatherMap.

## Technologies

- React
- Redux

## Tasks

- Build UI with React + SCSS
- Integrate OpenWeatherMap API
- Deploy on Vercel

## Screenshots

- `/weather-1.png`
